article.headline: Apple Inc. stock underperforms Tuesday when compared to competitors
article.body: Shares of Apple Inc. AAPL, +1.74% shed 2.87% to $113.16 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around dismal trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index COMP, +1.39% falling 1.57% to 11,154.60 and Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% falling 1.34% to 27,772.76. Apple Inc. closed $24.82 below its 52-week high ($137.98), which the company achieved on September 2nd. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Tuesday, as Microsoft Corp. MSFT, +2.48% fell 2.12% to $205.91, Alphabet Inc. Cl A GOOGL, +1.82% fell 2.15% to $1,451.02, and International Business Machines Corp. IBM, -2.81% fell 0.03% to $121.97. Trading volume (158.8 M) remained 22.2 million below its 50-day average volume of 181.0 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
